description: Prime Minister Matteo Renzi said Italy would “stop only when we have found the truth” about the death of Giulio Regeni in Egypt.
title: Italian Premier Speaks on Slain Student
title_page: Italian Premier Speaks on Slain Student - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Prime Minister Matteo Renzi said Italy would “stop only when we have found the truth” about the death of Giulio Regeni in Egypt.
